modName: Wolf Island the secret thalmor prision
summary: I thought of a very good idea the other day, what if i made a mod of a thalmor prison that you have to infiltrate and break out of im talking a huge fort filled with thalmor. descriptionHtml: I thought of a very good idea the other day, what if i made a mod of a thalmor prison that you have to infiltrate and break out of im talking a huge fort filled with thalmor. Like you should pick up the quest from a note in the thalmor HQ and then you show it to tullius/ stormcloak and they tell you they are going to send you in under cover, you then have to go in and start a prison riot to break out, and kill a ton of thalmor in the process/9one of my favorite things to do, i love killing thalmor) . the prision in my mind is like a prison camp for talos worshipers. I got this idiea from history class about Witold Pilecki (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Witold_Pilecki), who was a polish army resistance person during the nazi occupation in WWII. He was sent undercover in a concentration camp to find out what the germans were doing. sadly nobody believed him. But anyway thats the inspiration for this quest mod and if anyone wants to help me message me so we can get it started, im already building the prison in creation kit.
author: Joe
